title: Red Hat security advisory (AV25-841)
description: Between December 8 and 14, 2025, Red Hat published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in multiple products. Included were updates to address vulnerabilities in the Linux kernel for the following products:
products: Red Hat Enterprise Linux  multiple versions and platforms
Red Hat CodeReady Linux Builder  multiple versions and platforms
Red Hat Enterprise Linux Server  multiple versions and platforms
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
